comment.author: 32741315@N06
comment._content:
Welcome to The Commons National Galleries of Scotland!

Here's a c.1893 photo of RLS from our Photographic Archive, taken at his birthday party at Vailima, also posted here on The Commons ...

[http://flickr.com/photos/nationallibrarynz_commons/3114984582/]

-- Courtney
comment.authorname: National Library NZ on The Commons

comment.author: 27818381@N04
comment._content: wonderful. I've seen a similar portrait at his house in Vailima Apia, Samoa where he is looking at the camera. perhaps there was a series of images taken at the time.

comment.author: 21042979@N00
comment._content: What eyes! Such a beautiful portrait by Smith.

comment.author: 87914514@N00
comment._content: Hi, this photo has been mentioned in a discussion thread in the Flickr Commons group, and we'd love to have this added to the group pool! -- Seen in a discussion of Flickr Commons. (?)

comment.author: 14456531@N07
comment._content: Brilliant to see the Galleries on the Commons! Just thought I would make a reciprocal connection between this image and the Robert Louis Stevenson set on our Flickr account [http://www.flickr.com/photos/nlscotland/sets/72157604377830216/]

comment.author: 12363891@N03
comment._content: Nice portrait I hadn't seen before - lovely kind twinkle in his eye!

comment.author: 7146815@N06
comment._content: Beautiful. This man changed the world.

comment.author: 24026926@N00
comment._content: A visionary portrait! Thanks a lot for joining Flickr!

comment.author: 17098929@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Robert Louis Stevenson, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 8521690@N02
comment._content: Great shot, hope you will consider adding it and any similarly relevant photographs to the new group for Scot/Lit interest.

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Literary Scotland, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 30301237@N03
comment._content: Wonderful portrait of the man who wrote the greatest adventure story ever told!

comment.author: 8521690@N02
comment._content: Many thanks for contributing this fine image to the ScotLit group..
